section.p: ‘Hey you!’ cries an incredulous voice. ‘What are you doing?’
You look up from the carcass of the dead bull. ‘This bull attacked me...’
‘Course it did!’ says the farmer. ‘Didn’t you have enough sense to stay out of its field?’ That was my prize bull, I’ll have you know. I’ve a good mind to send for the militia.’

He forces you to pay as compensation. (If you don’t have that much, give him whatever you have.) Still, at least you get the chance to increase your COMBAT score by 1 if you can roll higher than your current COMBAT score on two dice.
